findings.title: M4F: Token symbol length validation
findings.description: The `_setup` function now validates the length of the token symbol.

findings.title: W1F: Usage of solc optimizer
findings.description: The project uses the `solc` optimizer which may lead to unexpected bugs and is not considered safe.

findings.title: M3F: Token symbol and address decoupling
findings.description: The function `handleTokenSend` receives `tokenSymbol` and `tokenAddress` as arguments, but the gateway manipulates funds based on an address retrieved using the symbol, which can differ from the supplied `tokenAddress`. This can lead to emitting events concerning funds that the originator of the transaction did not own.

findings.title: W2: Misleading error
findings.description: The misleading errors were removed, and new errors that better fit the given use cases were added.

findings.title: W3: Event data validation
findings.description: The functions used for paying gas do not perform any data validation on data passed to the corresponding events, allowing an attacker to pass malicious data.
